structure.unit: AID TO THE NEEDY BLIND -- EQUAL OPPORTUNITIES

law.history: Repealed 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 19. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1893a-10.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Fiscal courts may appropriate money for relief of the blind.
